content.text: VEON Ltd has established a significant market share within the telecommunications industry. With operations in various countries, including Russia, Pakistan, Ukraine, and others, VEON has a presence in both emerging and established markets. This broad market reach allows the company to capture a diverse customer base and expand its market share.

VEON Ltd prioritizes innovation, contributing to its competitive positioning. The company has been investing in technologies and services that cater to the evolving needs of customers. For example, VEON has developed digital platforms and mobile applications that offer various services like mobile banking, entertainment, and communication tools. Such innovations help differentiate VEON from its competitors and enhance its value proposition in the market.

news.headline: VEON Welcomes Former U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo to Kyivstar Board of Directors
